remarks: Convert an operation cancellation law to class notation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Dec-2014.)
statement:
caovcang.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. T /\ y e. S /\ z e. S ) ) -> ( ( x F y ) = ( x F z ) <-> y = z ) ) $.
caovcand.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. T ) $.
caovcand.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. S ) $.
caovcand.4 $e |- ( ph -> C e. S ) $.
caovcand $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A F B ) = ( A F C ) <-> B = C ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d C x y z $.
$d F x y z $.
$d S x y z $.
$d T x y z $.
$d ph x y z $.
